law.history: Repealed 1988 Ky. Acts ch. 225, sec. 27, effective July 15, 1988. -- Amended 1986 Ky. Acts ch. 147, sec. 2, effective July 15, 1986. -- Amended 1984 Ky. Acts ch. 140, sec. 1, effective July 13, 1984. -- Created 1970 Ky. Acts ch. 301, subtit. 12, sec. 21, effective June 18, 1970.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Discrimination in property, casualty or surety policies on group basis prohibited.
